synopsis.text:
Finally, the day has arrived for the grand festival in the Kingdom of Guardia, marking its thousand-year anniversary. But as the sun sets, a secret world comes alive, revealing a fantastical celebration for the creatures of the night. In this parallel festivity, two quirky monsters, Nuu and Mamo, embark on a quest to find new members for their group, Nuumamonjaa. Failing in their recruitment efforts, they dive headfirst into the merriment, participating in carnival games and drinking contests, even winning a coveted golden shovel.

However, their night of fun takes an unexpected turn when they encounter Gonzalez, a colossal singing robot. With every challenge they face, from outrunning a rocker in a high-speed car chase to confronting the melodious robot, Nuu and Mamo manage to outwit their predicaments unscathed.

Inspired by the beloved game "Chrono Trigger," this anime adaptation brings the carnival atmosphere to life, introducing a cast of diverse characters, each with their own unique experiences. As the night unfolds, the festivities become more vibrant and entertaining, filled with laughter, adventure, and a touch of the extraordinary. Don't miss out on the thrilling escapades of Nuu and Mamo in this delightful comedy that will keep you on the edge of your seat!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
